body: In the Avicus shop,it says gold ranks and above will have access to beta testing. Beta testing for what? How do I access it?
body_tagged: In the Avicus shop,it says gold ranks and above will have access to beta testing. Beta testing for what? How do I access it?
title: Beta Teesting

replies.body: When we develope something, it shall be made publicly a known, as well as information available?
